DataElement.preferredName: Type of Event Isolation And/Or Patient Discharge Or Date of Death Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day and year of release from isolation and/or patient discharge or date of death.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Type of Event Isolation And/Or Patient Discharge Or Date of Death Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A particular category of events regarded as having particular characteristics, qualities, and/or defined similarities._A state of separation; the act of isolating something; setting something apart from others; marked by separation of or from usually contiguous elements._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._The release of a patient from a course of care._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The calendar date of subject's death._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A particular category of events regarded as having particular characteristics, qualities, and/or defined similarities.

Concepts.definition: A particular category of events regarded as having particular characteristics, qualities, and/or defined similarities.

Property.preferredName: Isolation And/Or Patient Discharge Or Date of Death Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: A state of separation; the act of isolating something; setting something apart from others; marked by separation of or from usually contiguous elements.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:The release of a patient from a course of care.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The calendar date of subject's death.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: A state of separation; the act of isolating something; setting something apart from others; marked by separation of or from usually contiguous elements.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
The release of a patient from a course of care.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The calendar date of subject's death.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
